attributes.action: Grant  Royal Status to the town of Wootton-Bassett toRoyal Woottn Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir ,I humbly request that you petition her majesty Queen Elizabeth that the town of Wootton Bassett in the county of Wiltshire be granted the honour of having the prefix "Royal" added to its name.This to be in recognition of the dignity and respect this fine town and its people have shown to out service men and women who have been killed while serving over seas.Without exception the town and its people have turned out to pay their respects as the hearse's drive throught their town.This seems a very small gesture which i feel sure her majesty would consider favourably ,but one which would let these fine people know of the thanks of a nation for the kindness and respect they have shown to our fallen service personnel.

rejection.details: A very similar petition already exists, you may wish to add your support to: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/WoottonBassett/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
